about.title: About us
about.description: Join the community of modern entrepreneurs
about.sub1: As a team of crypto enthusiasts, we understand that cryptocurrency adoption will only be possible through a simple and user-friendly application for the general public.
about.sub2: We are doing everything we can to help millions of people explore and use this amazing world of technology daily and contribute to the ongoing revolution. Wexo solves the biggest obstacle from users' perspective so far, which was the complexity of individual blockchains and the possibilities of its daily use.
about.missionDescription: Our goal is to create an environment where two worlds meet in one application. The world of traditional finances with the modern world of cryptocurrencies, powered by blockchain, accessible to the general public worldwide. We connect the business environment with customers and think innovatively.
about.visionDescription: We envision a future built on blockchain, where tokenization and cryptocurrencies will cause a revolution in all industries. Wexo represents an intermediary step from the world of traditional finances and technologies to the world of cryptocurrencies, digital assets, modern tokens, and blockchains, contributing to the mass adoption of cryptocurrencies worldwide.
about.valuesDescription: We provide a worldwide service for all users without distinction. We strive to create a global network that makes cryptocurrencies accessible to anyone in the world on a daily basis. We aim to create a global path that makes the world of cryptocurrencies accessible to anyone in the world.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.description: Any questions? Interested in WEXO or WEXO Token? Contact our info centre.

blog.title: WEXO Blog
blog.description: Useful crypto tips and tricks for everyone. Up-to-date prices and market reports. Tips on how to buy the best cryptocurrencies.

Receive and pay with crypto with the WEXO wallet. Buy crypto with your card. The WEXO crypto wallet keeps you updated on the current crypto prices.

features.title: WEXO app's main features
features.feature1: Send, receive and hold your crypto.
features.feature6: Secured with face and touch ID

storage.title: Safe crypto storage
storage.description: Manage your portfolio in the WEXO mobile app.

currencies.title: WEXO supports the following cryptocurrencies
currencies.description: Buy, hold or trade – choose from the supported cryptocurrencies. WEXO supports the top cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, or stablecoins.

purchase.title: Buy Bitcoin and cryptocurrencies
purchase.subtitle: Pay by card – safe and simple.
purchase.description1: WEXO app provides a fast and simple way to buy bitcoin, ethereum, litecoin, and many others. Buy WEXO Token in pre-sale now with a discount.
purchase.description2: We regularly add new supported cryptocurrencies. Try buying your first cryptocurrency. Card purchases – fast, simple, and convenient. So simple anyone can do it.

tabs.title: WEXO: Bitcoin & Crypto wallet
tabs.subtitle: Hold, manage and trade cryptocurrencies in the app with security ensured through the face or touch ID

tab1.title: Send, receive and pay with cryptocurrencies
tab1.description: Simple and fast payments. Receive, send and pay with cryptocurrencies with the WEXO crypto app.

tab2.title: MSend cryptocurrencies using a phone number
tab2.description: With the WEXO app, you can send crypto using a phone number, i.e. without knowing the recipient's wallet address.

tab3.title: Exchange and trading
tab3.description: Buy, sell and swap cryptocurrencies quickly and easily. Try trading in the WEXO app.

tab4.title: Cryptocurrency charts and exchange rates
tab4.description: WEXO brings charts, crypto market, and price updates in a chosen period.

tab5.title: Card purchase
tab5.description: Buy cryptocurrencies with a card or safely and easily using Apple Pay or Google Pay. The WEXO app provides a fast and simple way to buy cryptocurrencies.

tab6.title: Crypto Standing orders
tab6.description: You can set up cryptocurrency standing orders, even to multiple wallets at once and send the amount specified in crypto or fiat currency.

wexo-token.title: WEXO token
wexo-token.description1: With the WEXO Token, you can be more than just its owner. With the WEXO Token, you become part of our community and ecosystem.
wexo-token.description2: The WEXO Token is the driving force of the Wexo platform, which, in a simple application, connects the world of traditional money and the modern world of cryptocurrencies supported by blockchain.
wexo-token.gainBenefits: Gain benefits in our ecosystem and profit

benefit1.title: Lower service fees
benefit1.description: WEXO Token holders will pay lower service fees thanks to the Loyalty Program. Pay significantly lower fees for provided services and other benefits.

benefit2.title: Better access to services
benefit2.description: WEXO Token holders will have a better experience and access to selected exclusive ecosystem features.

benefit3.title: Loyalty Program
benefit3.description: Improved and more attractive Loyalty Program. Earn better and more attractive benefits and rewards according to the achieved level.

tokenomics.title: Tokenomics
tokenomics.description: Vesting is a key part of the tokenomics of any crypto project. It is the process of holding, locking and releasing tokens of a given project.

vesting.title: Key vesting function
vesting.description1: It helps prevent a large number of tokens from flooding the market and thereby lowering the token price and the overall value of the project.
vesting.description2: It gives the development team time, space, and peace of mind to test, refine, and launch products on their platform.
vesting.description3: It helps ensure the long-term stability and viability of the crypto startup ecosystem.
vesting.description4: It helps protect the crypto community from the dishonest practices of big investors.
vesting.description5: It helps regulate the number of tokens in circulation, which can trigger an increase in the price of a given cryptocurrency.

loyalty.title: WEXO Loyalty
loyalty.description: Improved and more attractive Loyalty Program. Earn better and more attractive benefits and advantages based on your activity and current level.

benefits.title: Active users can enjoy these benefits

benefit1.title: Lower fees
benefit1.subtitle: Get a 17.5% fee discount.
benefit1.description: WEXO Token holders will pay lower service fees thanks to the Loyalty Program. Pay significantly lower fees for provided services and other benefits.

benefit2.title: Earn cryptocurrencies
benefit2.subtitle: Get a direct reward of up to 10%
benefit2.description: Direct commission in cryptocurrencies from each purchase of WEXO tokens by the invited user.

benefit3.title: WEXO premium features
benefit3.description: The selected premium "WEXO features" are only available to users on upper Loyalty Program levels.

achievements.title: You can achieve a higher rank in Loyalty in two ways:
achievements.inviter: The Inviter's career mainly comprises recommending our WEXO app to your friends in combination with purchasing a symbolic number of WEXO tokens.
achievements.tokener: As a Tokener, we'll reward you for buying and holding our WEXO tokens in your wallet. That's the only condition you have to fulfil. Progress to a higher level is directly proportional to the number of WEXO tokens in your wallet.

legend.title: Become a WEXO Legend
legend.description: Download our cryptocurrency app (iPhone/Android), join the Loyalty Program, and become a WEXO legend. Enjoy discounts and benefits, or earn cryptocurrencies and profit thanks to your activity.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.description: Your privacy is our priority. We understand its protection as a part of our social responsibility. Therefore, we would like to provide you with information on how we process your personal data when providing the Services (either via the website, or via the respective mobile application).
privacyPolicy.subtitle: PRIVACY POLICY WEXOPAY
privacyPolicy.general: Your privacy is our priority. We understand its protection as a part of our social responsibility. Therefore,we would like to provide you with information on how we process your personal data when providing the Services (either via the website, or via the respective mobile application). Words that are not defined in this document and begin with a capital letter have the meaning defined in the

basicProvisions.title: Basic Provisions
basicProvisions.first: 1.1 Pursuant to Article 4 (7) of Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and the Council on the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data, and repealing the Directive 95/46/EC (General Data Protection Regulation) (hereinafterreferred to as "GDPR"), the data controller is the Company:
basicProvisions.second: UPDN ONE s.r.o., ID: 026 54 962, with registered, office at Na strži 1702/65, Nusle, 140 00 Prague 4, company registered in the Commercial Register maintained by the Municipal Court in Prague under No. C 221822 (hereinafter referred to as the "Administrator").
basicProvisions.sixth: 1.2. Personal data means any information about an identified or identifiable natural person. An identifiable natural person is a natural person who can be identified, directly or indirectly, in particular by a reference to a specific identifier, such as name, e-mail address, cryptocurrency wallet data, payment account details, location details, network identifier or one or more special elements of the physical, physiological, genetic, mental, economic, cultural or social identity of this natural person.
basicProvisions.seventh: 1.3. The controller undertakes to use, collect and process personal data so that the User and other persons close to him do not suffer any damage to their rights, in particular the controller will ensure protection against unauthorized interference with the private and personal life of the User and his relatives.
basicProvisions.eighth: 1.4. The controller has not appointed a person responsible for personal data protection.

sourceAndCategories.title: 2. Sources and Categories of Personal Data Processed
sourceAndCategories.first: 2.1. The controller shall process the personal data provided to it by you or personal data which the controller has obtained during provision of the Services.
sourceAndCategories.second: 2.2. The Controller processes your identification and contact data and data necessary for the performance of the Contract
sourceAndCategories.third: 2.3. Concluded in compliance with the General Business Terms and Conditions wexo, namely:

ul.li4: Place of birth (including the state if a place of birth is outside the Czech Republic);
ul.li7: Type and number of the ID card;
ul.li8: State or authority that issued the ID card;
ul.li9: Period of validity of the ID card;
ul.li12: A document confirming the User's address;

sourceAndCategories.fifth: 2.4. Likewise, the controller shall process information on use of the website by the User, including the type of used browser, login times, web pages viewed, IP address and web pages that the user visited before accessing the Website;
sourceAndCategories.sixth: 2.5. Information about the computer or mobile device which the User uses to access the website, including the hardware model, operating system and Internet browser and their versions, unique device identifiers and mobile network information.

legalBasis.title: 3. Legal Basis and Purpose of Personal Data Processing
legalBasis.first: 3.1. The legal bases for processing personal data are the following:

ul1.li1: Performance of the Contract between you and the controller pursuant to the Section 6, (1) b) of GDPR,
ul1.li2: Performance of legal obligations of the controller according to the AML Act (especially the obligation to identify and control the client) and according to the regulations on tax and accounting records;
ul1.li3: Legitimate interest of the controller in provision of direct marketing (especially for sending commercial messages and newsletters) pursuant to the Section 6, (1) f) of GDPR, your consent with provision for the purposes of provision of direct marketing (especially for sending commercial messages and newsletters) pursuant to the Section 6, (1) a) of GDPR in connection with the Section 7 (2) of the Act No. 480/2004 Coll. on certain Information Society Services in case that no goods or services have been ordered.

legalBasis.second: 3.2. The Company declares that it considers all personal data of the User as confidential and will use them only for the following purposes:

ul2.li1: Operating the website and resolving related issues;
ul2.li2: Adaptation, evaluation and improvement of the website, including monitoring and analysis of trends, uses and activities related to the website;
ul2.li3: Delivery of marketing announcements, notices about update of provided services and advertising offers based on User preferences;
ul2.li4: For other purposes for which personal data is collected if such purpose is necessarily envisaged in the actual collection of such data or for purposes otherwise announced on the website at the time of provision of the personal data.

legalBasis.third: 3.3. There is no automatic individual decision-making by the Controller within the meaning of the Section 22 of the GDPR. You have provided your express consent to such processing.

dataRetentionPeriod.title: 4. Data Retention Period
dataRetentionPeriod.first: 4.1. The Controller shall keep the personal data

ul1.li1: For the time necessary to exercise the rights and obligations arising from the contractual relationship between you and the Controller and to assert claims from these contractual relationships (however, for a maximum of 10 years from termination of the contractual relationship);
ul1.li2: Data on individual transactions are kept for a period of 10 years from execution of individual transactions; until the consent to the processing of personal data for marketing purposes is revoked, however for a maximum of 5 years, if the personal data are processed on the basis of the consent.

dataRetentionPeriod.second: 4.2. After expiration of the retention period, the Controller shall delete the personal data.

personalDataRecipients.title: 5. Personal Data Recipients (Subcontractors of the Controller)
personalDataRecipients.first: 5.1. Recipients of the personal data are only persons involved in:

ul1.li1: Ensuring the operation of the website (01People s.r.o., company ID No.: 461 65 151, k Bataku 2780/25 909 01 Skalica, Slovak Republic);
ul1.li2: Ensuring of e-mail services (SendGrid service from the company Twilio Inc., 375 Beale Street, Suite 300, San Francisco, CA 94105, USA);
ul1.li3: Ensuring of related services (UPDN ONE s.r.o., ID No.: 026 54 962, with registered office at Na Strži 1702/65, Nusle, 14000 Prague 4, Czech Republic);
ul1.li4: Issuing and managing the WEXO digital token (W X INTERNATIONAL SOFTWARE TRADING LLC, reg. no. 1735444, located at 23 Boulevard Plaza Tower 2, Dubai, United Arab Emirates, PO box: 418695);
ul1.li5: Ensuring the operation of the Website and directly related services (CRYPTON DIGITAL, SE, ID No.: 51 051 435, with its registered office at Staré Grunty 18 Bratislava - mestská čtvrt' Karlova Ves 841 04, Slovak Republic);
ul1.li6: Ensuring of verification of the persons in the digital world (Onfido LTD, 3 Finsbury Avenue, London, England, company number: 07479524).

personalDataRecipients.second: The Controller has no intention to transfer personal data to a third country (i.e. a country outside the EU) or to an international organization, with the exception of the above-mentioned services SendGrid, Mailchimp and Onfido. In this case of the SendGird and Mailchimp services, the transfer of personal data shall be carried out on the basis of incorporation of standard contractual clauses into the agreements on the processing of personal data concluded with these processors. In the case of Onfido, personal data is transferred pursuant to Commission Implementing Regulation EU 2021/1772 of 28 June 2021 pursuant to Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council on the adequate protection of personal data by the United Kingdom
personalDataRecipients.third: For more information, please visit the websites of the listed services and the website of the Office for Personal Data Protection.
personalDataRecipients.fourth: W X INTERNATIONAL SOFTWARE TRADING LLC has contractually committed that the personal data transferred to it will not leave the EU.

yourRights.title: 6. Your Rights
yourRights.first: 6.1. Under the conditions set out in the GDPR, you have

ul1.li1: A right of access to your personal data under the Section 15 of the GDPR,
ul1.li2: A right to correct personal data pursuant to the Section 16 of the GDPR, or to restrict theirprocessing under the Section 18 of the GDPR,
ul1.li3: A right to delete personal data (including cancellation of your registration) pursuant to the Section 17 of the GDPR,
ul1.li4: A right to raise objection to the processing pursuant to the Section 21 of the GDPR (if your personal data is processed pursuant to the Section 6 (1) (e) or (f) of the GDPR),
ul1.li5: A right to the data portability (which were provided to the Controller by you) pursuant to the Section 20 of the GDPR, and
ul1.li6: A right to revoke the consent to processing sent in writing or electronically to the address or e-mail of the Controller.

personalDataSecurity.title: 7. Personal Data Security
personalDataSecurity.first: 7.1. The Controller declares that it has taken all appropriate technical and organizational measures to secure the personal data. At the same time, we would like to warn you that no method of data transfer over the Internet is 100% secure and reliable, and therefore the absolute security of your personal data can never be guaranteed.
personalDataSecurity.second: 7.2. The Controller has taken technical measures to secure data storages and personal data storages in paper form, in particular: passwords, secure operating system, data communication encryption and storage encryption, and maintains an updated antivirus program and all other software.
personalDataSecurity.third: 7.3. The Controller declares that personal data is accessible only to persons authorized by it and always only to the extent necessary.

amendments.title: 8. Amendments
amendments.first: 8.1. By using the website and/or the mobile application, you express that you have been acknowledged with this Privacy policy. When creating a user account, by confirming the registration you also confirm that you are familiar with the conditions of personal data protection and processing and that you accept them in full.
amendments.second: 8.2. The Controller is entitled to change these conditions. The Controller shall publish a new version of the Privacy Policy on the website, and at the same time inform you about it respectively.
amendments.third1: 8.3. You may exercise your rights described above, as well as ask any questions or file claims by filling in the form published on the website
amendments.third2: or by using other contact addresses of the Controller stated in the Article I hereof.
amendments.fourth: 8.4 This updated Privacy Policy shall become effective as from 23rd August July 2022.

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.description: Terms of Service and legal information for WEXO Token users. Read about our terms, conditions, and policies.
termsOfService.subtitle: WEXOPAY CRYPTOCURRENCY TERMS OF SERVICE

basicProvisions.title: Basic Provisions
basicProvisions.first: 1.1. Scope. These Terms govern the relationship between you, as a user, and the Company, as operator of the Website and Application, when you buy, sell, manage, receive or send cryptocurrencies through the Website or Application.
basicProvisions.second: 1.2. Definition. Words not defined directly in this document that begin with a capital letter shall have the meaning defined in the
basicProvisions.generalTerms: General Terms and Conditions of wexo
basicProvisions.third: 1.3. Priority of conditions. In the event of any conflict between these Terms and Conditions and the General Terms and Conditions, these Terms and Conditions shall prevail.

buyingAndSellingCryptocurrencies.title: 2. Buying and selling cryptocurrencies
buyingAndSellingCryptocurrencies.first: 2.1. Order. By completing and confirming the Order Form, the User enters into a Cryptocurrency Purchase or Sale Brokerage Agreement with the Company, whereby the Company agrees to broker the purchase or sale of the Cryptocurrency at the then current exchange rate within twenty-four (24) hours of receipt of the funds or Cryptocurrency.
buyingAndSellingCryptocurrencies.second: 2.2. Exchange rates. Our exchange rate for the purchase or sale of cryptocurrencies, which is used to determine the indicative exchange rate and the actual exchange rate, is variable and as such is constantly changing with respect to the situation on the cryptocurrency market. The exchange rate set by us includes all exchange brokerage fees and no other fees are charged for this Service. We always display current exchange rates on the Website and the App.
buyingAndSellingCryptocurrencies.third: 2.3. Indicative exchange rate. When completing an order, the user is shown the approximate amount of cryptocurrency to be purchased, or the approximate yield from the sale of the cryptocurrency, both at our current exchange rates.
buyingAndSellingCryptocurrencies.fourth: 2.4. Current exchange rate. A cryptocurrency transaction is executed at our current exchange rate within twenty-four (24) hours of receipt of funds or cryptocurrency.
buyingAndSellingCryptocurrencies.fifth: 2.5. Cancellation order. A User cannot cancel an order to buy or sell cryptocurrency without the Company's consent.
buyingAndSellingCryptocurrencies.sixth:
2.6. Rejection of the order. The Company may reject a user's order to buy or sell cryptocurrency. In such a case, the Company shall not be liable for any losses the User may suffer as a result. The Company may reject a User's order if:



a) there is insufficient quantity of the desired cryptocurrency available on the market;

b) one of the partner exchanges is not available;

c) The company has reason to believe that the purpose of the order is illegal; or

d) The Company has reason to believe that compliance with the Order could have a detrimental effect on the goodwill or reputation of Company
buyingAndSellingCryptocurrencies.seventh: 2.7. Fulfilment of the contract. The Company shall fulfil the Contract by crediting the amount of money in cryptocurrency or legal (fiat) currency specified in the instruction to the User's Account.

withdrawalFromTheContract.title: 3. Withdrawal from the contract
withdrawalFromTheContract.first: 3.1. Inability to withdraw without cause. The User, who is a consumer within the meaning of the Civil Code, acknowledges that it is not possible to withdraw from the Contract without giving lawful reasons, even within the statutory period of fourteen (14) days, since cryptocurrency is a commodity, the price of which depends on the fluctuations of the financial market independently of the will of the entrepreneur and which may occur during the withdrawal period.

taxObligations.title: 4. Tax obligations
taxObligations.first: 4.1. User's obligation. User understands that income from the purchase, sale and exchange of cryptocurrencies is subject to income tax. The Company is not responsible for the User's tax liability in any way related to the Scrolls provided. Any income earned by the User under the Agreement shall be taxed by the User in accordance with applicable law.

cryptocurrencyStorageAndTransfers.title: 5. Cryptocurrency storage and transfers
cryptocurrencyStorageAndTransfers.first: 5.1. Virtual account. All cryptocurrency that the Company provides custody of for Users is recorded in the Virtual Accounts of individual Users. Cryptocurrency is held directly by the Custodian in accordance with the law, but is held on behalf of the User and the User has legal title to the cryptocurrency.
cryptocurrencyStorageAndTransfers.second: 5.2. Pooled wallets. The cryptocurrency custody of which is provided by the Company for individual Users is stored on pooled cryptocurrency wallets, which also hold the cryptocurrencies of other Users. These cryptocurrency wallets have been created and are secured directly by the Company or by a third party providing cryptocurrency custody services to the Company.
cryptocurrencyStorageAndTransfers.third: 5.3. Private keys. A user does not have their own private keys to a cryptocurrency until they transfer the cryptocurrency from escrow to their own cryptocurrency wallet. The User can view the current balance of the Cryptocurrency(s) at any time via the Company's Website or the Application.
cryptocurrencyStorageAndTransfers.fourth: 5.4. Fork. The rules of a particular cryptocurrency can be changed through changes to the cryptocurrency's protocol, which are referred to as a fork. A fork can significantly change the properties, functions, cryptocurrencies; and/or withdraw support for both new cryptocurrencies, even without further action. The Company shall be entitled to retain the balance of the cryptocurrency no longer supported.
cryptocurrencyStorageAndTransfers.fifth: 5.5. Transfers. On the Website or in the Application, the User can transfer his/her cryptocurrency to his/her own or someone else's cryptocurrency wallet.
cryptocurrencyStorageAndTransfers.sixth: 5.6. Withdrawal fee: If the user wishes to withdraw its balance (fiat or cryptocurrencies), the user shall proceed according to the instructions provided. Withdrawals are subject to a withdrawal fee. The current amount of withdrawal fee may vary depending on various factors (such as the amount you wish to withdraw, the blockchain load, the complexity of blockchain network, etc.). The user will be notified about the actual amount of withdrawal fee before agreeing with the withdrawal transaction. If the user agrees with the actual amount of withdrawal fee, such withdrawal fee will be automatically deducted from the user's transaction or balance.
cryptocurrencyStorageAndTransfers.seventh: 5.7. Irreversibility of the transfer. The User is aware that any error in the cryptocurrency address may lead to irreversible loss of cryptocurrency

dangersAndRisks.title: 6. Dangers and risks of cryptocurrencies
dangersAndRisks.first: 6.1. High general risks. User acknowledges and understands that any conduct or provision of services related to cryptocurrencies is high risk due to their experimental nature and virtually unpredictable economic and regulatory developments.
dangersAndRisks.second: 6.2. Decentralised systems. Cryptocurrencies are made up of autonomous and essentially unregulated global computing networks. Due to the absence of central authorities, cryptocurrency transactions are virtually irreversible and errors or theft of cryptocurrencies are thus generally unrecoverable. The value of cryptocurrencies depends on trust in these peertopeer (P2P) networks and their cryptographic security. The evolution of human knowledge and developments in software and hardware may affect the trust in these networks and the value of the cryptocurrencies created in this way.
dangersAndRisks.third: 6.3. High volatility. Cryptocurrencies are highly volatile. Cryptocurrency exchange rates against conventional (fiat) currencies can experience sharp fluctuations of tens of percent or more, even within a few hours.
dangersAndRisks.fourth: 6.4. Lack of sectoral regulation. The Principal is aware that for Companies incorporated and domiciled in the Czech Republic and the Slovak Republic (see the General Terms and Conditions of wexo) cryptocurrencies are not electronic money or other funds within the meaning of the Payment Act, as amended, and that according to the Czech National Bank and the National Bank of Slovakia, cryptocurrencies are generally not regulated as transferable securities or other investment instruments within the meaning of the Capital Market Undertakings Act, as amended.
dangersAndRisks.fifth: 6.5. Lack of sectoral oversight. The provision of services relating to cryptocurrencies (including services under this Agreement) is not subject to supervision by the Czech National Bank and National Bank of Slovakia, nor is it regulated by public authorities in any special way, with exceptions (in particular measures against the laundering of proceeds of crime and terrorist financing). In view of the above, neither are the services provided under this Agreement are investment services within the meaning of that Act on capital market business.
dangersAndRisks.sixth: 6.6. Risks associated with hacker attacks and other outages. The User acknowledges that cryptocurrency exchanges and other entities providing cryptocurrency-related services, including the Company, are not fully regulated financial market entities, the cryptocurrencies held by them are not insured, and in the event of a hacking attack against such entities or the User's account, in the event of an outage of their services for any other reason, or in the event of a hacking attack against the cryptocurrency network itself, the User may irreversibly lose all funds managed at any time without compensation.
dangersAndRisks.seventh: 6.7. Unpredictable developments. The user is aware that the above assessment and view of the public authorities may change in the future.
dangersAndRisks.eighth: 6.8. Disclaimer. In view of the above risks, the Company cannot and shall not be held liable for any developments regarding cryptocurrencies, including the possibility of their complete loss of value, prohibition by the Czech Republic or other nation states (e.g. the state where the user or the Company's subcontractors are located), up to their complete loss or extinction.
dangersAndRisks.ninth: 6.9. The user assumes all risks. By entering into the Agreement, the User accepts all risks associated with cryptocurrencies

riskWarning.title: Risk Warning:
riskWarning.description: Cryptocurrency trading is associated with high market risk due to the so-called high volatility of the cryptocurrency exchange rate. WEXO strives to select high quality cryptocurrencies, but is not responsible for any losses from your trading activities. The materials on this site are for informational purposes only and should not be considered financial or business strategic advice. Please trade with caution. Before making any investment, you should carefully consider your financial situation, investment objectives and level of tolerance for potential risk.
